oneShot: This is the one-shot for the first test room. This should only be seen once per fresh game.
description: This is a test room with test objects. Use this for testing conditions.

exits.name: NORTH
exits.description: The yawing mouth of the maze is before you. The air as black an thick as tar.

description: You are in a small, stone room with a grate blocking you to the north.
